title: Solution matching
content:
A quick method to resolve an incident is to search for a solution or workaround that applied to another incident with similar circumstances or field values. Service Management stores the information found in these incident record fields:

  • Title
  • Description
  • Solution
  • Location
  • Service
  • Configuration item

When you create a new incident, you can search for other incidents that have matching information in one or more of these fields. The solution that resolved the earlier incident might also apply to the new incident. When you can find a satisfactory solution or workaround, you can decrease the amount of time to resolve the new incident.
